caption.title: The chromatographic profile obtained with high-resolution gas chromatography for Cinnamomum cassia oil using an AGILENT 7820A Gas Chromatograph. Column: HP-5 30 m × 0.32 mm × 0.25 μm (AGILENT). Temp.: Column: 70°C (0 min), 3°C/min at 240°C. Injector: 240°C Split: 1/50. FID detector: 250°C. Vol. injection time: 1 µL (conc 1.0% in chloroform). Vany Ferraz, Chemistry Department, Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais. Requested by Ferquima (Vargem Grande Paulista, SP, Brazil).
